definition: A company or organization that specializes in the transportation and logistics of goods, typically involving the coordination of shipments, storage, and delivery. It is commonly used in the context of business and commerce.

examples.german: Die Spedition hat den Auftrag pünktlich geliefert.
examples.english: The freight forwarder delivered the order on time.

examples.german: Die Spedition organisiert den Transport der Waren.
examples.english: The shipping company organizes the transportation of goods.

examples.german: Die Spedition bietet internationale Logistikdienstleistungen an.
examples.english: The freight forwarder offers international logistics services.

examples.german: Die Spedition hat eine große Flotte von Lastwagen.
examples.english: The shipping company has a large fleet of trucks.

examples.german: Die Spedition kümmert sich um die Zollabfertigung.
examples.english: The freight forwarder takes care of customs clearance.
